message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
Alice, $11,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,500. I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me than that. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
